entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Tillsonburg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:26 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of snow. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of snow this morning. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 3 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 40 km/h gusting to 70 in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
